definition: quantity of electric charge or current
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The amount of power people use goes up and down, but it stays above a certain level all the time.
sentences.chinese: 人们的耗电量忽上忽下，但总会在一定水平之上。

sentences.english: For instance, we might want to work out a power value that changes minute by minute.
sentences.chinese: 例如，我们可能需要计算出每一分钟的电量值。

sentences.english: By using ice, Veolia doesn't need to use as much electricity during the day.
sentences.chinese: 通过使用冰，威立雅白天并不需要那么多的用电量。

sentences.english: It requires substantially less electrical consumption for deposition and, as a result, less refrigeration for cooling.
sentences.chinese: 电泳本身耗电量少，从而用于冷却的冷量也少。

sentences.english: The two-hour auto-off, helps to maintain battery power.
sentences.chinese: 两小时自动关闭，有助于保持电池电量。

sentences.english: The existing in-grid power pricing policies are lack of protection measures for desulfurized and clean power supply.
sentences.chinese: 现行竟价上网政策缺乏对脱硫洁净电量的保护措施。

sentences.english: Six practical function of living, Special query Voltage and electric quantity, saving power visible.
sentences.chinese: 六大生活实用功能，特设电压电量查询，省电看得见。

sentences.english: Air conditioners account for about 60 percent of Hong Kong's electricity usage in the hot, humid, sub-tropical summers.
sentences.chinese: 在炎热潮湿的夏季，空调耗电量占全港耗电的六成。

sentences.english: WB intelligent electrical transmitter is divided into single-phase and three-phase two classes.
sentences.chinese: WB智能电量变送器分为单相和三相两类。

sentences.english: Replacing the traditional instrument cluster are semitransparent digital gauges for speed and battery life.
sentences.chinese: 取代了传统的半透明数字式速度和电池电量表。

sentences.english: Deep penetration laser welding is associated with violent plasma generation characterized by high charge densities.
sentences.chinese: 激光深熔焊接时伴随着高电量等离子体的产生。

sentences.english: As the demand for power increases, the supply is proportionately increased.
sentences.chinese: 随着对电力需求的增加，供电量也增加。

sentences.english: It will generate 1,260 megawatts of electricity, most of  which will be sold to Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 它的发电量达1260兆瓦特，其中大部分卖给泰国。

sentences.english: Check whether or not the front light and power light work normally.
sentences.chinese: 前灯和电量显示灯是否显示正常。

sentences.english: There hasn't been a substantial drop-off in the growth of power generation fueling China's growth.
sentences.chinese: 推动中国经济增长的发电量增速并没有出现明显下降。

sentences.english: The amount of power released, he says, is much greater than that predicted by thermoelectric calculations.
sentences.chinese: 他说，所释放的电量比热点计算法预计的要多得多。

definition: to recharge (a battery)/(fig.) to recharge one's batteries (through leisure)/to update one's skills and knowledge
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to wait for an opportunity/(electronic devices) standby
